title: Ep 262 | Jase Faces a Tough Crowd in NYC, Climate Change & Playing God, & an Elon Musk Prediction
description:
Phil and his crew may have bent the rules for the sake of the kingdom when they filmed in Greece. Jase looks back at the street preaching he did in New York City and recalls a TOUGH crowd. The guys talk about the creation of cyborgs and other attempts to make the ultimate man without God, and Al makes a prediction about Elon Musk. They also get into Paul's sermon on Mars Hill, the religion of climate change, and what it means that God isn't far from us. And Jase proposes a global God test.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
